rows.label: tev010401_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev010401_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Carl about the gate.

rows.label: tev010401_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss

rows.label: tev010401_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Carl if anything is troubling him.

rows.label: tev010401_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Carl how to switch between night and day.

rows.label: tev010401_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Carl for his thoughts on your mission results.

rows.label: tev010401_SEL0051
rows.name: Ask Carl if anything is troubling him.

rows.label: tev010401_SEL0061
rows.name: Ask Carl how to switch between night and day.

rows.label: tev010401_SEL0071
rows.name: Ask Carl for his thoughts on your mission results.

rows.label: tev010401_SEL0081
rows.name: Ask Carl how to best get around NLA.

rows.label: tev010401_SEL0091
rows.name: Ask Carl about the terrain of Mira.

rows.label: tev010401_SEL0101
rows.name: Ask Carl about his thoughts on the Ma-non.

rows.label: tev010401_SEL0111
rows.name:
Ask Carl about his thoughts on
the Skell you found in Noctilum.

rows.label: tev010401_SEL0121
rows.name: Ask Carl about his thoughts on Goetia.

rows.label: tev010401_SEL0131
rows.name: Ask Carl how he fared during the attack.

rows.label: tev010401_SEL1011
rows.name: Ask Carl about any recent developments.

rows.label: tev010401_SEL1021
rows.name: Ask Carl about his thoughts on the Wrothians.

rows.label: tev010401_SEL1031
rows.name:
Ask Carl about his thoughts on
your battle with the Zu Pharg.

rows.label: tev010401_SEL1041
rows.name: Ask Carl for his thoughts on Lao's betrayal.

rows.label: tev010401_SEL1051
rows.name: Ask Carl about the battle for the Lifehold Core.

rows.label: tev010401_SEL1061
rows.name: Ask Carl about the battle for the Lifehold Core.

rows.label: tev010401_MSG0001
rows.name:
That gate over there? The east one?
Can you believe how long it's been sealed?
This is really getting to be a hassle![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010401_MSG0002
rows.name:
Huh? You want to know why people can pass through
the west gate, but not this east one?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010401_MSG0003
rows.name:
Well, New LA is just the residential unit of a ship
that's been hastily reconstructed into a city.
It wasn't exactly built with ease of access in mind.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010401_MSG0004
rows.name:
The west gate entrance is where the passage to the
White Whale's maintenance-management area used
to be.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010401_MSG0005
rows.name:
I'm surprised you didn't know that. Everybody kno—oh!
Are you that newly discovered crew member?
You are, aren't you? Hey, welcome to New LA![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010401_MSG0006
rows.name:
Man, I'm as excited about my next mission as I am my
next root canal. You wanna swap? ...Just kidding.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010401_MSG0007
rows.name:
I mean, I'd love to swap, but if Trevor found out that
I passed a mission off, he'd tear me a new one.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010401_MSG0008
rows.name:
Trevor's as strict as they come, and no mistake.
You don't ever wanna get on his bad side.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010401_MSG0009
rows.name:
Seriously? You just got here and they're already
sending you out on data-probe installation? Daaay-um![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010401_MSG0010
rows.name:
You want my advice? Travel by day, and only by day.
It's a hell of a lot safer that way.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010401_MSG0011
rows.name:
When it gets dark, crawl into a free tent or trailer at a
base camp and sleep until sunrise.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010401_MSG0012
rows.name:
If you go walking around at night and get lost,
you'll probably never see another sunrise again.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010401_MSG0013
rows.name:
So let me get this straight. You safely installed
a data probe on your very first mission,
AND killed a tyrant while you were at it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010401_MSG0014
rows.name: Holy crap, [ST:gender p1=dude p2=lady ]. You do NOT mess around![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010401_MSG0015
rows.name:
Man, I'm really gonna enjoy having you around.
'Cause I sure as hell don't wanna do this stuff![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010401_MSG0016
rows.name:
Man, I'm so sick of Trevor pushing us around.
He made me do an indigen bounty mission solo![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010401_MSG0017
rows.name:
Now he's sending me on a super-hard mission in some
area we've barely got any FrontierNav info about.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010401_MSG0018
rows.name:
It sure would be great if someone went and planted a
data probe in Primordia for me, you know? Yep.
Suuuuure would be great.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010401_MSG0019
rows.name:
Like, that new kid everyone's talking about?
The one installing data probes all over the place?
It would be great if [ST:gender p1=he p2=she ] did that. I'm just saying.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010401_MSG0020
rows.name:
I just heard that you were taking over for Nelson's
team on that search mission. You gotta be careful
out there, man. Seriously.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010401_MSG0021
rows.name:
I know you've heard it before, but it's all the more
important that you travel during the day when you're
exploring uncharted lands.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010401_MSG0022
rows.name:
When it gets too dark to find your way,
just rest up in a tent or trailer at a base camp.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010401_MSG0023
rows.name:
Base camps are awesome, man. They make good
landmarks, plus you can catch forty winks without
looking over your shoulder the whole time. I love 'em.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010401_MSG0024
rows.name:
No way. There's just... I mean, no WAY!
Did you seriously take down that Prone fortress?
Like, seriously?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010401_MSG0025
rows.name:
Man, I can't believe how much you've done.
And you just got here![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010401_MSG0026
rows.name:
Ah, I shouldn't keep you. You have a report to file.
Hurry over to the barracks[ST:gender p1=, man! p2=! ] Go go go![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010401_MSG0027
rows.name:
You're probably the first BLADE to ever live up to
Vandham's expectations. ...Or maybe everyone does,
and it's just me that disappoints him?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010401_MSG0028
rows.name: Whoa, your next mission's in Noctilum?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010401_MSG0029
rows.name:
If that's the case, you probably want to go out through
the west gate in the industrial district. That'll be quicker.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010401_MSG0030
rows.name:
You can get to the industrial district in a blink of an
eye if you take the transport in front of BLADE Tower.
It's a big time-saver.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010401_MSG0031
rows.name:
If you go northeast from New LA, and then east some
more, the terrain turns into a wasteland.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010401_MSG0032
rows.name:
Mira's a really messed-up place. All of a sudden, bam!
You're in a wasteland! Or, bam! You're in a forest![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010401_MSG0033
rows.name:
It just doesn't have the middle ground that Earth does.
Those sorts of transitions were always really gradual
on Earth, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010401_MSG0034
rows.name:
Makes you wonder how exactly the continents of Mira
were formed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010401_MSG0035
rows.name:
All of a sudden there's this massive ship overhead,
and all these smiling Ma-non are like, "Hi, I guess?"
I was like, damn! Now I've really seen everything.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010401_MSG0036
rows.name:
Now they're just wandering around the city,
chatting with folks, offering to upgrade machines,
and eating all the pizza that isn't bolted down.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010401_MSG0037
rows.name:
It's like the city's sprung to life all of a sudden.
I mean, it was awfully quiet without any kids around,
so it's kinda fun having the Ma-non here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010401_MSG0038
rows.name:
Of course, we'd make friends with any xenoforms YOU
rescue, no matter what they're like![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010401_MSG0039
rows.name:
They were carrying in some Skell-like thing earlier.
Being real careful with it, too. You're the one who
found that, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010401_MSG0040
rows.name:
That's pretty incredible, finding something like that
and bringing it back to the city.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010401_MSG0041
rows.name:
So are they gonna use that to develop new models
of Skells or something?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010401_MSG0042
rows.name:
I guess it doesn't really matter to me. I'd never get to
pilot 'em, 'cause I don't even have a license.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010401_MSG0043
rows.name:
I wonder how that squid lady knows so much about
us humans.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010401_MSG0044
rows.name:
Maybe the Ganglion interrogated a captured BLADE?
Or they were able to pull the info out of someone's
wrecked mimeosome?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010401_MSG0045
rows.name:
Well, whatever the story, I ain't about to criticize.
If the Ganglion threatened to torture me, I'd spill
everything I knew in two seconds flat.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010401_MSG0046
rows.name:
As an Interceptor, it's my duty to risk my life in the
defense of New LA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010401_MSG0047
rows.name:
I mean, that's the way it's SUPPOSED to be, but I ain't
gonna lie to you, man—at the first sign of trouble,
I ran crying to the restricted hangar's engine room.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010401_MSG0048
rows.name:
When the enemy busted in after me, I thought I was
a dead man. But they just stole that Skell back and
went on their merry way.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010401_MSG0049
rows.name:
I thought it'd be safe down there, but it's like we
just stopped defending the hangar right in the middle
of the invasion![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010401_MSG0050
rows.name:
Of COURSE it's gonna get stolen if we're all half-assed
about it! When we have something important in there,
we really gotta tighten up our guard.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010401_MSG0051
rows.name:
Ah, hell. Maybe I shoulda done something.
I'm sorry, man. If it makes you feel any better,
I already had Trevor tear me a new one.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010401_MSG0072
rows.name:
Thanks to you helping me out, Trevor actually had
something nice to say to me for once.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010401_MSG0073
rows.name:
But man, it still bothers me. Even if they're indigens,
I don't wanna kill a mom with her kid, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010401_MSG0074
rows.name: I guess I'm just not cut out to be an Interceptor.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010401_MSG0075
rows.name:
Man, I wish I could be like you, just cutting through
everything that gets in my way.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010401_MSG0076
rows.name:
I read the reports about your fight with those
Wrothians! They seemed like surprisingly
decent guys, actually.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010401_MSG0077
rows.name:
They're less scary than a lot of the other xenoforms out
there, though I know looks can be deceiving.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010401_MSG0078
rows.name:
I even heard that Nopon you hang around with calling
them the "kitty-cat people."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010401_MSG0079
rows.name: I think they look more like lions, but what do I know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010401_MSG0080
rows.name:
Oh, man, we owe you big. Seriously.
Thank you so much.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010401_MSG0081
rows.name:
When I think about what would have happened if
that massive mech had made it to New LA...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010401_MSG0082
rows.name:
Woof! It would have made that previous attack on
the city look like recess![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010401_MSG0083
rows.name: You're seriously my [ST:gender p1=hero p2=heroine ]. No, you're OUR [ST:gender p1=hero p2=heroine ].[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010401_MSG0084
rows.name:
Back when New LA was attacked, it was Lao
who was guarding the restricted hangar, right?
And he just stopped fighting mid-invasion?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010401_MSG0085
rows.name:
I guess that was intentional, huh?
I mean, I've heard the rumors about him...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010401_MSG0086
rows.name:
Still, I feel like they could have chosen someone better
than me to pilot the thing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010401_MSG0087
rows.name:
Trevor told me that thinking about things like that won't
do me any good.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010401_MSG0088
rows.name:
But I just can't get out of this rut, you know?
Man, I'm pathetic.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010401_MSG0089
rows.name:
Man, I've been letting you do the hard work all this
time, while I muddle through just enough missions to
get Trevor off my back.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010401_MSG0090
rows.name:
But now I see now how wrong that is!
I mean, maybe I'll never be a great hero like you,
but I'm gonna stop shirking and start fighting.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010401_MSG0091
rows.name:
Once I get my gear together, I'm off to the Lifehold
Core. I'll see you there, man! You're going to witness
Carl fighting the good fight.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010401_MSG0092
rows.name: Well? Did you see me fighting the good fight?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010401_MSG0093
rows.name:
...Where was I? What kinda question is that?!
I was working my butt off supporting you guys![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010401_MSG0094
rows.name:
Ah, that's fine. What's important is that the Lifehold
Core is safe and you made it back in one piece.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010401_MSG0095
rows.name:
Hey, so when do you think they're gonna let us go
back to our old bodies? I can't wait to squeeze into
that thing again![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010401_MSG0096
rows.name:
Hey, thanks a lot for your help with that whole
suid piglet thing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010401_MSG0097
rows.name:
I heard that afterward, a way bigger suid came to
the place where the piglets were.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010401_MSG0098
rows.name:
You think that was maybe one of their parents?
Like, those suids were just waiting for their mama the
whole time?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010401_MSG0099
rows.name:
Isn't that incredible? We did good!
Preserving the animals and stuff![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010401_MSG0100
rows.name:
Trevor yelled at me and called me a softhearted
hippie, but I still know we did the right thing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010401_MSG0101
rows.name:
I mean, I know it looked that way, but we saved
those little piglets' lives. I feel totally vindicated.[ST:wait ]
